flawed_nl_solution:
Ryan used 36/3 = <<36/3=12>>12 tokens on Pac-Man.
Ryan used 36/4 = <<36/4=9>>9 tokens on Candy Crush.
Ryan used a total of 12+9+7 = <<12+9+7=28>>28 tokens on all three games.
Ryan had 36-28 = <<36-28=8>>8 tokens left.
Ryan's parents bought him 2*7 = <<2*7=41>>41 more tokens.
Ryan had 8+41 = <<8+41=49>>49 tokens after his parents bought him some.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 41. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
